Traits.Name: Burrow Mastery
Traits.Content: Holy Molly can burrow through any type of material as if it were difficult terrain. This ability allows her to navigate underground with ease and always finds a safe path.

Traits.Name: Luck of the Golden Mole
Traits.Content: Once per day, when a creature within 30 feet of Holy Molly rolls a dice, it can reroll the result and must use the new roll.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: Holy Molly's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells: At will: guidance, thaumaturgy. 2/day each: bless, shield of faith.

Actions.Name: Ground Snap
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage as Holy Molly lunges forward with her strong jaws.

Actions.Name: Lucky Burrow (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The creature does either Burrowing Surge or Disorienting Tunneler.

Actions.Name: Burrowing Surge
Actions.Content: Holy Molly burrows quickly through the ground, creating a ripple effect in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Actions.Name: Disorienting Tunneler
Actions.Content: Holy Molly burrows beneath the surface, creating tremors that disrupt her enemies. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of their next turn. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on a success.
